rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with proper reception area; adheres to Vastu by facing the main entrance from the East.
Integrated open kitchen and living space promoting family interaction; Vastu compliant with proper ventilation and lighting, oriented to maximize natural light.
Spacious bedroom featuring an ensuite bathroom and walk-in closet; designed for privacy and comfort with a North-West facing orientation recommended by Vastu.
Bedroom allocated for children, oriented to provide calm energy per Vastu guidelines.
Additional bedroom with balanced proportions and adequate storage.
Guest bedroom designed to be versatile; follows Vastu principles by maintaining a peaceful energy flow.
Common bathroom with modern fixtures; layout considers privacy and proper ventilation.

openings.description: Access to a two-car garage that provides secure parking for vehicles.
Main entrance door aligned with Vastu principles, facing East.

vastu_notes: The design considers Vastu principles by orienting rooms with regard to cardinal directions, ensuring a balance of energy flow. The open-plan kitchen and living area maximize natural light and air circulation, while the private zones (bedrooms) are placed in optimal positions for privacy.
